GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
drm/msm/disp/dpu1: avoid clearing hw interrupts if hw_intr is null during drm uninit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit a7ca30c3a8b2e8bda65f2b922d382ac056be8aa4, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit f25f656608e3a54ac3e0747be415cf3d4a69cef8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/disp/dpu1: avoid clearing hw interrupts if hw_intr is null during drm uninit
